Access to it is granted by EPAM - Service Desk Processing Center members, but in order to see something in the application, a group's Curator should assign particular role to employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are the following roles in LMS: Admin, Curator, Teacher, Mentor, Mentee and the so-called role Resource Manager (not a role, but a set of permissions).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Roles Teacher, Mentor and Mentee are assigned by Curators.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Curators are created in LMS by LMS Admins in module “Curators”. Primary Skill should be specified to create a Curator.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager is not a role in LMS, but a set of permissions inherited by user from his status of Resource Manager in UPSA (thus, a user cannot be assigned role/permissions of Resource Manager in LMS). Resource Manager has read-only permissions in LMS. This read access to LMS is granted to a Resource Manager for him to check progress of his subordinates in LMS.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additional details about this application are available in wiki:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/LMS\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LMS\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
